alert.note: Alert for Eastern Santa Clara Hills; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 8:30AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Alameda and north central Santa Clara Counties through 900 AM PST... At 830 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Alum Rock, or near San Jose, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Jose, Santa Clara, Milpitas, Alum Rock, East Foothills, Sunol-Midtown, Seven Trees and Buena Vista. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Santa Clara Hills; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose
